query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT ,A.ITEM AS ITEM ,A.WOKNUM AS WOKNUM ,A.MATKL AS MATKL ,A.MATNR AS MATNR ,A.MENGE AS QNTY ,VALUE(A.SPEC12, '') AS SPEC12 ,VALUE(A.SPEC3, 0) AS SPEC3 ,VALUE(A.SPEC5, 0) AS SPEC5 ,VALUE(A.ECSF, '') AS ECSF ,VALUE(A.ETM, '') AS ETM -- 신규 추가분 ,VALUE(A.AUSE ,'') AS AUSE ,VALUE(A.ACAPA ,'') AS ACAPA ,VALUE(A.AOPEN,'') AS AOPEN ,VALUE(CAST(A.AFQ AS INT) ,0) AS AFQ ,VALUE(CAST(A.ASTQ AS INT) ,0) AS ASTQ ,VALUE(A.ADRV ,'') AS ADRV ,VALUE(A.ASPC,'') AS ASPC ,VALUE(A.ACD1,'') AS ACD1 ,VALUE(A.ACD2,'') AS ACD2 ,VALUE(CASE A.BFTH WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE A.BFTH END, 0 ) AS BFTH ,VALUE(A.BWM ,'') AS BWM ,VALUE(A.BMOPB ,'') AS BMOPB ,VALUE(A.BCDM ,'') AS BCDM ,VALUE(A.BHR ,'') AS BHR ,VALUE(A.CJM1 ,'') AS CJM1 , VALUE(CASE A.CJM1Q WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE A.CJM1Q END, 0 ) AS CJM1Q ,VALUE(A.CJM1M ,'') AS CJM1M ,VALUE(A.CJM1FR ,'') AS CJM1FR ,VALUE(A.CHD1 ,'') AS CHD1 , VALUE(CASE A.CHS1Q WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE A.CHS1Q END, 0 ) AS CHS1Q , VALUE(CASE A.CHD1Q WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE A.CHD1Q END, 0 ) AS CHD1Q ,VALUE(A.DEPH ,'') AS DEPH ,VALUE(CAST(A.DEPHTQ AS INT) ,0) AS DEPHTQ ,VALUE(CAST(A.EHO AS INT),0) AS EHO ,VALUE(CAST(A.EHTRH AS INT),0) AS EHTRH ,VALUE(CAST(A.EHP AS INT),0) AS EHP ,VALUE(CAST(A.EHH AS INT) ,0) AS EHH ,VALUE(CAST(A.EHV AS INT) ,0) AS EHV ,VALUE(A.EHM,'') AS EHM ,VALUE(CAST(A.ECCA AS INT),0) AS ECCA ,VALUE(CAST(A.ECCB AS INT),0) AS ECCB ,VALUE(CAST(A.ECCH AS INT),0) AS ECCH ,VALUE(CAST(A.ECAA AS INT),0) AS ECAA ,VALUE(CAST(A.ECBB AS INT),0) AS ECBB ,VALUE(CAST(A.ECEE AS INT),0) AS ECEE ,VALUE(A.ETMM ,'') AS ETMM ,VALUE(A.ERPD ,'') AS ERPD ,VALUE(A.ERPW ,'') AS ERPW ,VALUE(A.ERPR ,'') AS ERPR ,VALUE(A.ECRL ,'') AS ECRL ,VALUE(A.ECGV ,'') AS ECGV ,VALUE(A.ECWRL,'') AS ECWRL ,VALUE(A.ECWW ,'') AS ECWW ,VALUE(A.ECWSF ,'') AS ECWSF ,VALUE(A.DSV1 ,'') AS DSV1 ,VALUE(A.DCCTV ,'') AS DCCTV ,VALUE(A.DCAIR ,'') AS DCAIR , VALUE(CAST(A.ECJJ AS INT) ,0) AS ECJJ ,VALUE(CAST(A.ECHH AS INT) ,0) AS ECHH ,VALUE(A.ASTDA, '') AS ASTDA FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT ,A.WOKNUM AS WOKNUM ,A.MATKL AS MATKL ,A.MATNR AS MATNR ,VALUE(A.MENGE, 0) AS MENGE ,A.ITEM AS ITEM ,B.SPEC12 AS SPEC12 ,B.SPEC3 AS SPEC3 ,B.SPEC5 AS SPEC5 ,C.VALUE AS ECSF ,D.VALUE AS ETM , D1.VALUE AS AUSE , D2.VALUE AS ACAPA , D3.VALUE AS AOPEN , D4.VALUE AS AFQ , D6.VALUE AS ASTQ , D7.VALUE AS ADRV , D8.VALUE AS ASPC , D9.VALUE AS ACD1 , E.VALUE AS ACD2 , E1.VALUE AS BFTH , E2.VALUE AS BWM , E3.VALUE AS BMOPB , E4.VALUE AS BCDM , E5.VALUE AS BHR , E6.VALUE AS CJM1 , E7.VALUE AS CJM1Q , E8.VALUE AS CJM1M , E9.VALUE AS CJM1FR , F.VALUE AS CHD1 , F1.VALUE AS CHD1Q , F2.VALUE AS CHS1 , F3.VALUE AS CHS1Q , F4.VALUE AS DEPH , F5.VALUE AS DEPHTQ , F6.VALUE AS EHO , F7.VALUE AS EHTRH , F8.VALUE AS EHP , F9.VALUE AS EHH , G.VALUE AS EHV , G1.VALUE AS EHM , G2.VALUE AS ECCA , G3.VALUE AS ECCB , G4.VALUE AS ECCH , G5.VALUE AS ECAA , G6.VALUE AS ECBB , G7.VALUE AS ECEE , G8.VALUE AS ETMM , G9.VALUE AS ERPD , H.VALUE AS ERPW , H1.VALUE AS ERPR , H2.VALUE AS ECRL , H3.VALUE AS ECGV , H4.VALUE AS ECWRL , H5.VALUE AS ECWW , H6.VALUE AS ECWSF , H7.VALUE AS DSV1 , H8.VALUE AS DCCTV , H9.VALUE AS DCAIR , J.VALUE AS ECJJ , J1.VALUE AS ECHH, J2.VALUE AS ASTDA
FROM ( SELECT AA.MANDT, AA.WOKNUM, AA.MATKL, AA.MATNR AS MATNR, AA.MENGE AS MENGE, BB.ITEM FROM ( -- 자재번호로 조회 SELECT A.MANDT, A.WOKNUM, A.MATKL, A.IDNRK AS MATNR ,CASE A.BOM_LEVEL WHEN '01' THEN A.MENGE WHEN '02' THEN (SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND WOKNUM = A.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = A.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #REDATE# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * A.MENGE END AS MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.IDNRK IN (SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT071 AS A1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 ON B1.MANDT = A1.MANDT AND B1.DEPT = A1.DEPT AND B1.GJAHR = A1.GJAHR AND B1.ITEM = A1.ITEM AND B1.GUBUN = '1' -- 자재 WHERE A1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A1.DEPT = #DEPT# AND A1.GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND ( REPLACE(A1.STYM, '000000', '') = '' OR A1.STYM > SUBSTR(CAST(HEX(DATE(SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 1, 4)||'-'||SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 5, 2)||'-'||'01') - 12 MONTHS) AS VARCHAR(8)), 1, 6) ) ) AND A.CRDAT BETWEEN #RSDATE# AND #REDATE# AND (A.PRCTYP IN ('A','N') OR (A.PRCTYP = 'C' AND A.CTYP IN ('Q','B'))) --신규, 추가, 변경(수량, 수량주석)
UNION ALL
SELECT A.MANDT, A.WOKNUM, A.MATKL, A.IDNRK AS MATNR ,CASE A.BOM_LEVEL WHEN '01' THEN (CASE A.PRCTYP WHEN 'D' THEN A.MENGE * 0 WHEN 'C' THEN A.OLD_QUAN * 0 END) WHEN '02' THEN (CASE A.PRCTYP WHEN 'D' THEN (((SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND WOKNUM = A.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = A.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #REDATE# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * A.MENGE) * 0) WHEN 'C' THEN (((SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND WOKNUM = A.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = A.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #REDATE# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * A.OLD_QUAN) * 0) END) END AS MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.IDNRK IN (SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT071 AS A1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 ON B1.MANDT = A1.MANDT AND B1.DEPT = A1.DEPT AND B1.GJAHR = A1.GJAHR AND B1.ITEM = A1.ITEM AND B1.GUBUN = '1' -- 자재 WHERE A1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A1.DEPT = #DEPT# AND A1.GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND ( REPLACE(A1.STYM, '000000', '') = '' OR A1.STYM > SUBSTR(CAST(HEX(DATE(SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 1, 4)||'-'||SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 5, 2)||'-'||'01') - 12 MONTHS) AS VARCHAR(8)), 1, 6) ) ) AND A.CRDAT BETWEEN #RSDATE# AND #REDATE# AND (A.PRCTYP = 'D' OR (A.PRCTYP = 'C' AND A.CTYP IN ('Q','B'))) --삭제, 변경(수량, 수량주석)
-- 도면번호로 조회 UNION ALL
SELECT A.MANDT, A.WOKNUM, A.MATKL, A.DZEINR AS MATNR ,CASE A.BOM_LEVEL WHEN '01' THEN A.MENGE WHEN '02' THEN (SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND WOKNUM = A.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = A.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #REDATE# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * A.MENGE END AS MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DZEINR IN (SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT071 AS A1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 ON B1.MANDT = A1.MANDT AND B1.DEPT = A1.DEPT AND B1.GJAHR = A1.GJAHR AND B1.ITEM = A1.ITEM AND B1.GUBUN = '2' -- 도면 WHERE A1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A1.DEPT = #DEPT# AND A1.GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND ( REPLACE(A1.STYM, '000000', '') = '' OR A1.STYM > SUBSTR(CAST(HEX(DATE(SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 1, 4)||'-'||SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 5, 2)||'-'||'01') - 12 MONTHS) AS VARCHAR(8)), 1, 6) ) ) AND A.CRDAT BETWEEN #RSDATE# AND #REDATE# AND (A.PRCTYP IN ('A','N') OR (A.PRCTYP = 'C' AND A.CTYP IN ('Q','B'))) --신규, 추가, 변경(수량, 수량주석)
UNION ALL
SELECT A.MANDT, A.WOKNUM, A.MATKL, A.DZEINR AS MATNR ,CASE A.BOM_LEVEL WHEN '01' THEN (CASE A.PRCTYP WHEN 'D' THEN A.MENGE * 0 WHEN 'C' THEN A.OLD_QUAN * 0 END) WHEN '02' THEN (CASE A.PRCTYP WHEN 'D' THEN (((SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND WOKNUM = A.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = A.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #REDATE# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * A.MENGE) * 0) WHEN 'C' THEN (((SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND WOKNUM = A.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = A.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #REDATE# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * A.OLD_QUAN) * 0) END) END AS MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DZEINR IN (SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT071 AS A1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 ON B1.MANDT = A1.MANDT AND B1.DEPT = A1.DEPT AND B1.GJAHR = A1.GJAHR AND B1.ITEM = A1.ITEM AND B1.GUBUN = '2' -- 도면 WHERE A1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A1.DEPT = #DEPT# AND A1.GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND ( REPLACE(A1.STYM, '000000', '') = '' OR A1.STYM > SUBSTR(CAST(HEX(DATE(SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 1, 4)||'-'||SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 5, 2)||'-'||'01') - 12 MONTHS) AS VARCHAR(8)), 1, 6) ) ) AND A.CRDAT BETWEEN #RSDATE# AND #REDATE# AND (A.PRCTYP = 'D' OR (A.PRCTYP = 'C' AND A.CTYP IN ('Q','B'))) --삭제, 변경(수량, 수량주석)
-- 보수자재로 조회 UNION ALL
SELECT b.mandt, b.afnam as WOKNUM, c.block_no as matkl, b.matnr, b.menge FROM SAPHEE.ekko AS a INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ekpo AS b ON b.ebeln = a.ebeln and b.mandt = a.mandt INNER JOIN SAPHEE.mara AS c ON c.matnr = b.matnr and c.mandt = b.mandt WHERE a.mandt = #G_MANDT# and a.bedat BETWEEN #RSDATE# AND #REDATE# --" 발주일 AND b.werks = '2000' -- " 보수플랜트 AND b.knttp in ('' , 'F') -- " STOCK발주만 조회 AND b.loekz = '' AND b.matnr IN ( SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT071 AS A1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 ON B1.MANDT = A1.MANDT AND B1.DEPT = A1.DEPT AND B1.GJAHR = A1.GJAHR AND B1.ITEM = A1.ITEM AND B1.GUBUN = '1' -- 도면 WHERE A1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A1.DEPT = #DEPT# AND A1.GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND ( REPLACE(A1.STYM, '000000', '') = '' OR A1.STYM > SUBSTR(CAST(HEX(DATE(SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 1, 4)||'-'||SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 5, 2)||'-'||'01') - 12 MONTHS) AS VARCHAR(8)), 1, 6) ) )
) AS AA
INNER JOIN TABLE( SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT ,A.ITEM AS ITEM ,B.MATNR AS MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT071 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.DEPT = A.DEPT AND B.GJAHR = A.GJAHR AND B.ITEM = A.ITEM WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DEPT = #DEPT# AND A.GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND ( REPLACE(A.STYM, '000000', '') = '' OR A.STYM > SUBSTR(CAST(HEX(DATE(SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 1, 4)||'-'||SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 5, 2)||'-'||'01') - 12 MONTHS) AS VARCHAR(8)), 1, 6) ) ) AS BB ON AA.MANDT= BB.MANDT AND AA.MATNR = BB.MATNR
WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS A
-- 상세조건 추가부분 (SPEC, 인승, 속도) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE( SELECT MANDT, POSID_1, CASE WHEN ZSPEC12 IN (' ', '') THEN '' ELSE ZSPEC12 END AS SPEC12, CAST(CASE WHEN ZSPEC3 IN (' ', '') THEN '0' ELSE ZSPEC3 END AS INT) AS SPEC3, CAST(CASE ZSPEC5 WHEN ' ' THEN '0' WHEN '17L' THEN '17' WHEN '13M' THEN '13' WHEN '' THEN '0' ELSE ZSPEC5 END AS INT) AS SPEC5 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# ) AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = B.POSID_1
-- 상세조건 추가부분 (CAR SAFETY) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ECSF' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S1 ON A.MANDT = S1.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S1.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ECSF' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS C ON C.MANDT = S1.MANDT AND C.HOGI = S1.HOGI AND C.CHARACTERISTIC = S1.CHARACTERISTIC AND C.SEQ = S1.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 (TM) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ETM' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S2 ON A.MANDT = S1.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S1.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ETM' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D ON D.MANDT = S2.MANDT AND D.HOGI = S2.HOGI AND D.CHARACTERISTIC = S2.CHARACTERISTIC AND D.SEQ = S2.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 ( AUSE) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_AUSE' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S3 ON A.MANDT = S3.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S3.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_AUSE' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D1 ON D1.MANDT = S3.MANDT AND D1.HOGI = S3.HOGI AND D1.CHARACTERISTIC = S3.CHARACTERISTIC AND D1.SEQ = S3.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 ( ACAPA) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACAPA' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S4 ON A.MANDT = S4.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S4.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACAPA' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D2 ON D2.MANDT = S4.MANDT AND D2.HOGI = S4.HOGI AND D2.CHARACTERISTIC = S4.CHARACTERISTIC AND D2.SEQ = S4.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 ( AOPEN) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_AOPEN' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S5 ON A.MANDT = S5.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S5.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_AOPEN' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D3 ON D3.MANDT = S5.MANDT AND D3.HOGI = S5.HOGI AND D3.CHARACTERISTIC = S5.CHARACTERISTIC AND D3.SEQ = S5.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 ( AFQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_AFQ' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S6 ON A.MANDT = S6.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S6.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_AFQ' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D4 ON D4.MANDT = S6.MANDT AND D4.HOGI = S6.HOGI AND D4.CHARACTERISTIC = S6.CHARACTERISTIC AND D4.SEQ = S6.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 ( ASTQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ASTQ' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S7 ON A.MANDT = S7.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S7.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ASTQ' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D6 ON D6.MANDT = S7.MANDT AND D6.HOGI = S7.HOGI AND D6.CHARACTERISTIC = S7.CHARACTERISTIC AND D6.SEQ = S7.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 ( ASTQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ADRV' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S8 ON A.MANDT = S8.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S8.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ADRV' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D7 ON D7.MANDT = S8.MANDT AND D7.HOGI = S8.HOGI AND D7.CHARACTERISTIC = S8.CHARACTERISTIC AND D7.SEQ = S8.SEQ -- 상세조건 추가부분 ( ASPC) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ASPC' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S9 ON A.MANDT = S9.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S9.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ASPC' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D8 ON D8.MANDT = S9.MANDT AND D8.HOGI = S9.HOGI AND D8.CHARACTERISTIC = S9.CHARACTERISTIC AND D8.SEQ = S9.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 ( ACD1) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACD1' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S10 ON A.MANDT = S10.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S10.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACD1' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D9 ON D9.MANDT = S10.MANDT AND D9.HOGI = S10.HOGI AND D9.CHARACTERISTIC = S10.CHARACTERISTIC AND D9.SEQ = S10.SEQ
-- 상세조건 추가부분 (ACD2) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACD2' GROUP BY S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S11 ON A.MANDT = S11.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S11.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S.MANDT, S.HOGI, S.VALUE, S.CHARACTERISTIC, S.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S WHERE S.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACD2' AND S.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS E ON E.MANDT = S11.MANDT AND E.HOGI = S11.HOGI AND E.CHARACTERISTIC = S11.CHARACTERISTIC AND E.SEQ = S11.SEQ
